channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 23:54 The threat of percussion BLAZPLACKS, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district
item.description: 🟡 23:54 The threat of percussion BLAZPLACKS, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkiv_The territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
